Text: Thanks for this edition of Moran.Excellent.Your engineering books are great.

dynstab2, 

I *am* exceptionally greatful for this upload of yours.  As well as all the other mechanical engineering material that you have posted.  I cannot emphasize this enough.  

Would you happen to have the 6th editon of this book?  I have found a few scanned copies.  But I've been looking for the 6th edition vector text, pdf.  

I only ask because I have spent so much time (thermo courses, and tech elects) working out of my 6th edition hardcopy.

@fatetard  All I have in native PDF is the 5th and 7th. 6th: My own personal print copy (the one with the white cover). I too wish I could find a nice PDF copy. I just found a digital copy but didn't download it. At 125 MB my guess is this must either be a broken copy or a scan. :-(
Do you by any chance have the solutions manual?

Thanks a lot for the upload.
Do you happen to have the textbook "Mechanics and Thermodynamics of Propulsion"? Could you please, upload that if you have it?

Thanx
Thank you very much!!!!!!!!!!! Greeaaat upload!! :D ...btw I really really need the solution manual for this one, do you happen to have it or you know where I can find it? I appreciate it :)

The file that is downloaded is "Moran_Shapiro_Fundamentals_Engineering_Thermodynamics_7th_txtbk.7z" - which has no file extension. It isn't a PDF or any other viewable document format. So, how the hell have the other downloaders view this textbook???
Disregard my last comment. I recently reloaded my pc and hadn't installed Winrar yet.
